channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: How Gaurav and Saurabh Luthra, owners of Goa nightclub, fled to Thailand hours after fire
‘India shouldn’t be in delusion…’ How Pakistan’s Asim Munir continues warmongering
History Today: How the first intifada ignited in Gaza
FirstUp: Amit Shah to lead Vande Mataram debate in Rajya Sabha, Trump rally in Pennsylvania... The news of the day
The murder of Australian woman in which Indian-origin man has been convicted
Who is OnlyFans star Bonnie Blue? Why was she arrested in Bali?
Geopolitical signaling, strategic autonomy and a decisive shift in power equation: India’s diplomacy sparkles during Putin visit
item.description: It may not be a coincidence that neither did Zelenskyy had anything to say about Putin’s schmoozing with Modi, nor did Trump fire off another grumpy Truth Social post — a triumph of Indian diplomacy

item.title: How Taliban’s plan to dam Kabul-Kunar basin will squeeze water-stressed Pakistan further
item.description: The proposed Kunar-Panjshir and other Kabul basin projects effectively turns the Kabul River into an extension of South Asia’s broader water competition

item.title: How Prof Yunus is teaching fascism in Bangladeshi universities
item.description: Muhammad Yunus’s administration has lodged a systematic war against students, teachers, and officials who hold views even slightly divergent from the regime’s preferred ideological order

item.title: India’s Brics presidency and US chairing G20 will test New Delhi’s diplomatic balancing in 2026
item.description: India’s approach is pragmatic, not doctrinal: work with whoever is necessary to achieve outcomes. In 2026, this pragmatism will be tested as India balances expectations across very different tables

item.title: How Jaishankar’s Pakistan diagnosis is accurate, and why India must build on it
item.description: The External Affairs Minister is correct in categorically stating that India should never seek to hyphenate itself with Pakistan–now India is far ahead of Pakistan

item.title: What Putin’s Delhi visit and India-Russia 2.0 mean for China
item.description: The Delhi summit positions India and Russia in testing the logic of resilience and prompts China to recalibrate accordingly
